AddCertificateToDomain.name: AddCertificateToDomain
AddCertificateToDomain.description:
Grants permission to add certificates for mutual TLS authentication to a domain name.
                                                This is an additional authorization control for managing the DomainName resource due
                                                to the sensitive nature of mTLS

DELETE.name: DELETE
DELETE.description: Grants permission to delete a particular resource

GET.name: GET
GET.description: Grants permission to read a particular resource

PATCH.name: PATCH
PATCH.description: Grants permission to update a particular resource

POST.name: POST
POST.description: Grants permission to create a particular resource

PUT.name: PUT
PUT.description: Grants permission to update a particular resource

RemoveCertificateFromDomain.name: RemoveCertificateFromDomain
RemoveCertificateFromDomain.description:
Grants permission to remove certificates for mutual TLS authentication from a domain
                                                name. This is an additional authorization control for managing the DomainName resource
                                                due to the sensitive nature of mTLS

SetWebACL.name: SetWebACL
SetWebACL.description:
Grants permission set a WAF access control list (ACL). This is an additional authorization
                                                control for managing the Stage resource due to the sensitive nature of WebAcl's

UpdateRestApiPolicy.name: UpdateRestApiPolicy
UpdateRestApiPolicy.description:
Grants permission to manage the IAM resource policy for an API. This is an additional
                                                authorization control for managing an API due to the sensitive nature of the resource
                                                policy
